adddoing.mainHeading: Your active contribution to health and education
adddoing.description: WellFit goes beyond theory: our "learning by doing" approach offers you interactive experiences that directly improve your health, fitness and skills. Whether in parks, museums, zoos or at home - with WellFit you can track your activities, receive personalized feedback and continuously learn and grow.
adddoing.vision: Our vision is to make technology, health and education accessible everywhere - no matter where you are.
adddoing.museumDescription: Experience the captivating fusion of technology, art, and history through a unique interactive journey.
adddoing.parksDescription: On every outing, you will expand your knowledge about our wonderful "Mother Nature."
adddoing.homeDescription: Use personalized applications to optimize your fitness and knowledge from the comfort of your own home.
adddoing.zoosDescription: WellFit will deepen your understanding of a wide variety of animal species.

footer.newsletterDescription: Stay informed about the upcoming phases of WellFit and the release of our whitepapers!

contribution.title: Your contribution to a better future
contribution.text1: By participating in the first phase of our pre-sale, you are laying a cornerstone for the future of WellFit – and beyond. Your investment is more than just financial support: it secures the patent for our groundbreaking technology and empowers us to turn the vision of WellFit into reality.
contribution.text2: Through the acquisition of WellFit Tokens, you become part of a movement that redefines the boundaries of health, education, and technology. You help us protect innovation, enhance quality of life, and create a platform that inspires people worldwide.
contribution.text4: You won’t just witness a revolution in health and technology – you’ll actively shape it. Together, we’re building a world where wellness and knowledge go hand in hand. Join us as WellFit moves the world forward.
contribution.text6: Your decision propels us all toward a brighter future.

hero.title: Discover the future of technology, health, and education
hero.description: A revolutionary platform that rewards you while boosting your health and knowledge

insight.title: An Exclusive Insight
insight.text1: There are rare moments when opportunities arise that have the potential to transform our lives profoundly —
insight.isChance: is precisely such a chance. Our vision is not just ambitious; it is revolutionary: we aim to connect
insight.transformative: in an entirely new and transformative way.
insight.enhance: — that not only expand our knowledge but also significantly enhance our well-being.
insight.movement: is more than a project; it is a movement redefining how we learn, move, and interact with each other.
insight.aspire: we aspire to enrich peoples daily lives, motivating them to achieve
insight.goals: their goals, lead healthier lives, and enjoy the process.
insight.positiveChange: creating a platform that not only inspires but also drives positive change worldwide.
insight.text4: This is more than an idea — its the beginning of a new era.

shaping.title: Shaping the Future Together
shaping.intro: is not just an investment – it’s your personal contribution to making the world healthier, more connected, and more innovative. With our vision, we aim to uniquely combine health, education, and technology, making them accessible everywhere: in museums, zoos, nature, or directly in your home. Together, we are building a platform that sustainably inspires people worldwide and actively drives change.
shaping.together: Together, we are creating a platform that sustainably inspires people worldwide and actively drives change.
shaping.support: Your support becomes a valuable legacy.
shaping.partOf: you become part of something truly unique and receive a strictly limited physical
shaping.complementedBy: This is complemented by a digital NFT that grants you exclusive rights and benefits.
shaping.votingDesc: Influence the development of our platform with exclusive voting privileges.
shaping.priorityDesc: Gain early access to the beta phase and enjoy exclusive features reserved for a select group of supporters.
shaping.symbolDesc: Your Physical WellFit token serves as a collectable and a testament to your involvement in a global movement.

revolution.title: Be part of the revolution – right from the start
revolution.intro: We stay right now on our turning point where technology, innovation, health be combinated. After our pre-sale we will register our patent to protect and secure the exclusive of our vision. Be part of our long term WellFit innovation. Be one of the early WellFit phases and you get exclusive benefits and you save your movement in the new worldwide standards.
revolution.investmentOpportunity: We recently turned down a viable investment opportunity that would have cost us 50% of the shares. Why? Because we believe in our vision and don’t want to sacrifice it for short-term gains. Your investment will help us achieve our long-term goals and keep WellFit in the hands of those who believe in sustainable change - like you.
revolution.support: Your support helps protect our values ​​and vision
